column4: Yeah, I'm an idiot and can't seem to get the userlist to display on a fresh Ubuntu install.  hlep hlep!1
ubuntu isn't as good as slack on this 200mhz. :(
pimentinha: faca o favor me ajuda pq naum posso de ver meu userlist em xchat!
user list in xchat?? is that what youre looking for?
open a term and sudo apt-get install xchat << what you are using now is xchat-gnome
I did sudo apt-get install xchat
if its actually xchat, the user list should be there <shrug>
it's not, riotkiddie...  and i've used xchat before....
if i can't find the userlist here, could you help me locate the .bitchxrc file for bitchx?
i did a locate, but does locate find hidden files too?
